Privacy  Policy

Article 4 (Purpose of Use of Personal Information)

We use acquired Personal Information for the following purposes.
Services uses cookie, web beacon, and other technologies to understand the use trend, efficiently operate the advertisement, inflow from search engines, and maintain temporary information.

On websites or services provided by companies other than ours linked from Services, such companies may acquire Personal Information, but this does not apply to Privacy Policy, and we do not assume any obligations or responsibilities for these business to acquire information.
We will retain your Personal Information for the period necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in Privacy Policy unless a longer retention period is required or permitted by law.
